content: oh hey DM crafters DM scottie here and welcome to Dan's craft short tip today
we have a fun little project it's building off of the dead tree project
this is going to be a larger tree a live tree but it's going to have an
interesting feature on it it's going to have a perch a sniper perch so that
enemies can snipe a your player characters almost with impunity because
they could pull a rope ladder or rope up and the players have a hard time getting
up to them so they would have to either fight back the missile weapons or spell
so it can be a fun little challenge for your players and a very easy easy
project to do and let's go the table and we'll get started
so here's the tree perch I'm working on you can see a figure will fit on the
perch move it all around the tree be careful when you put the branches on you
don't want to make it so that it's hard for a figure to stand on there but I've
got the I put the branches on yet but I want to show you what I did so I just
cut the disc and cut through the circle then cut out the center and then slid it
over the tree and then I added some braces three braces around the tree you
can even do like branches coming up to be braces if it was more like an elf
thing basically I just did the technique of using the paper towel roll put it
soaking glue on the paper towel wrapping it around the roll and then squishing it
swishing it down and then the base is just thin cardboard with hot glue I
glued it to the stand and added some roots with the hot glue so now what I'm
going to do is I'll just I'll go ahead and add those branches to the tree and
paint it up and I'll show you what it looks like
here's my tree with the perch and I think it really came out well the perch
looks nice you can set figures on there like I've shown earlier so what you
could do is have the figures pummeling the players with missile weapons and or
the players can get up here and do the same to the monsters but what I would
say is like the monsters have a rope or they have a ladder rope ladder that they
can climb up and they can pull up when they get up there so for the players to
get up there they got to climb the tree and try to get around this which would
not be an easy feat so it could be an interesting challenge for the players
let me take these off and I'll show you a few more details so you can see the
base I did a little bit of flocking on there and I did some glue gun texture on
there so it looks like the roots are going into the base I also did some glue
gun texture on the DES tree itself and on the perch so that looks really nice I
also painted the perch a different color than I did the tree so it kind of sets
it off from the tree itself now you notice the branches on here and the
branches are the same way I did the dead tree they're just the same from the
exact same plastic plant that I did with a dead tree although I did a little bit
I did a few things differently one thing I did differently is when I poked him in
I put some hot blue on the end to make it larger as it connects to the tree so
since this is a larger tree I thought that would be appropriate I also added
some little green stuff here that to represent foliage on the tree since it's
not a dead tree but I didn't want to make the foliage too crazy to obstruct
play but but give it enough of a you know a presence that it would look like
a live tree so and what and you can also get this stuff larger what I use for
this was I use these this coarse Scenic's turf and all I did was I just
spread white glue over the branches and then poured this stuff on caught it on a
plate and then used it over and over on the rest of the branches but you can see
this is only four dollars and this just wood you could do dozens of trees with
this just a small packet you can also get bigger piece
if you wanted like thicker foliage on the tree but I just liked that I thought
it was just enough of a presence to make the tree nice and look like it's living
without being any kind of hindrance to play or all the stuff falling off when
you bump it every time so I think that turned out nice and there you go
there's a nice easy way and cheap way to make trees that you could have perches
on for your enemies to sit on and snipe with your poor player characters so
there we go and I'll see you next time on DMS crafting hey guys if you're
really digging these videos and would like some more information or to talk to
other crafters look at the link below in the description and you can join my
forum on the dams craft we'd love to have you and I'll see you there
